message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $6,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target price.
